revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.doodlelabs.com/products/802-11-wifi-mimo-radio-transceivers/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Doodle_Labs_ACM-TB-3 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Doodle Labs |model = ACM-TB-3 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/10/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Doodle_Labs_ACM-TB-3 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = Mini Card
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9890; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MMCX |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = Public Safety Band, military grade |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2014 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Singapore
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Additional specifications, per the manufacturer's site, follow.. *Noted as being tri-band, supporting 2.4 GHz (2402 ~ 2482 MHz), PSB (4940 ~ 4990 MHz), and 5 GHz (5180 ~ 5825 MHz) bands *Receive sensitivity: ranges from -100 to -62 dBm, +- 2 dBm **Receiver LNA gain: +15 dBm **'high selectivity band-pass filters' are noted as being used *Tx power: up to 22 dBm per stream w/ QAM16 (MCS4), 27 dBm aggregate for 3 streams *Ambient operating temp. range: -40°C to +70°C *Dimensions: noted as [[Dimensions::30 mm x 50 mm x 6 mm]] *<small>additionally, ''loopback'' mode is supported to assist with FIPS [[wikipedia:Advanced Encryption Standard|AES]] certification</small> and <small>integrated GPS ('''SiRF Star IV''', includes power feed for an active antenna) or USB hub capability is also (optionally) available</small>
[[Category:English Documentation]] [[Category:Tri-Band]]
